channel.title: How do i put in the cordinatats on server
channel.description: You know on the server it shows you the coordinates of where your standing on the options menu, well in Satens Isle its not on there how can i get the coordinate showings to come back..

item.title: How do i put in the cordinatats on server
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

type ::coordson in the game to make them display in the lower right hand corner…only if your using mopar client though.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put in the cordinatats on server
